adjectives.description: uncritical (comparative more uncritical, superlative most uncritical)

entries.meaning: Lacking critique or critical examination; undiscriminating.
examples: Let any competent judge read Hacket's Life of Archbishop Williams, and then these Sermons, and so measure the stultifying, nugifying effect of a blind and uncritical study of the Fathers  […]

entries.meaning: Having a disregard for critical standards or procedures.
